channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Two thieves bought a $500K lottery ticket with a stolen credit card. The victim wants $250K. Does he deserve it?
item.description: This sordid tale is so unusual that it could only be a fictionalized moral quandary dreamed up by the likes of David Lynch

item.title: Jeremy Grantham on the meltdown coming for U.S. stocks and where he’s putting his money now
item.description: GMO’s co-founder Jeremy Grantham discusses the dangers facing investors now and areas of the market he favors.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Dividend stocks are soaring in 2025, as investors adopt a defensive strategy amid market selloff
item.description: U.S. dividend stocks are soaring in 2025, as investors are on the hunt for ways to play defense amid concerns over economic growth and President Trump...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: The ‘bro bubble’ is bursting, says Bank of America strategist. Here are the key levels to watch for the Nasdaq, Palantir and more.
item.description: The so-called ‘bro bubble’ — the testosterone-fueled rally in cryptocurrencies and other speculative tech stocks — is popping, and one strategist iden...

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: ‘She’s not working outside the home’: My mother, 63, inherited $100,000. Is she too old to invest in the stock market?
item.description: “Are the only options to create a CD ladder or leave it in a high-interest savings account?”
